actionAppleScript.inline: tell application "System Events" to key code 18 using control down do shell script "python3 ~/touchbarconfig/touchbar.py -w 1"

longActionAppleScript.inline: tell application "System Events" to key code 18 using {control down, option down} do shell script "python3 ~/touchbarconfig/touchbar.py -m 1"

actionAppleScript.inline: "Screen Shot " & (current date) & ".png" do shell script "screencapture ~/Desktop/" & quoted form of result
"Screen Shot " & (current date) & ".png" do shell script "screencapture -i ~/Desktop/" & quoted form of result
tell application "System Events" to key code 2 using control down
